contents.text: Thank you for calling ThousandEyes in San Francisco, where we help your business gain visibility into every network you rely on.
To speak with our Sales team about enterprise network monitoring solutions, press 1.
To request a live product demo or trial access, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a demo specialist.

navigationGoals: I need to set up a trial of the ThousandEyes network monitoring platform.
I’d like to set up a live trial of your network monitoring solution.
I’d like to schedule a live demo and trial of ThousandEyes to evaluate its network performance monitoring across our multi-cloud infrastructure.
I’d like someone to guide me through a trial demo of your network monitoring service.
As a physics grad student, I'd like to schedule a live demo or trial access for ThousandEyes for my research group.

contents.text: For pricing details and volume licensing inquiries, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our sales desk for pricing information.

navigationGoals: I want to review pricing plans and volume licensing options.
I need detailed pricing and volume licensing information for our organization.
I need detailed pricing and volume licensing options for monitoring over 500 endpoints with API integration.
I need detailed pricing information for purchasing multiple network monitoring licenses.
I'm exploring academic pricing and volume licensing options for ThousandEyes for our physics department lab.

contents.text: For Technical Support and network performance assistance, press 2.
For help troubleshooting network issues or outages, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Technical Support engineer.

navigationGoals: I need assistance troubleshooting a current network outage.
I’m having a network outage and need technical support to troubleshoot it.
I need technical support troubleshooting packet loss and latency spikes in our WAN tests.
I’m experiencing a network outage and need technical support to troubleshoot.
I need to troubleshoot network outages affecting my remote lab experiments and speak with a technical support engineer.

contents.text: For account management and billing questions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing department.

navigationGoals: I need clarification on recent invoice charges and billing details.
I have questions about my current invoice and need help with billing.
I have a billing inquiry about our subscription renewal invoice and usage overage charges.
I have a question about my account billing and invoice details.
I have a billing question regarding my ThousandEyes student account and need to update my payment details.
